definition[0]: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of copper and zinc
definition[1]: musical instruments that are made of metal, such as the trumpet and the trombone
definition[2]: the people in an orchestra or band who play musical instruments that are made of metal
definition[3]: an object made of brass, usually with a design cut into it, or several brass objects
definition[4]: the top managers in an organization
example[2]: Mr Sprey and the Air Force brass clashed continually over major elements of the planeâ€™s design.
